nodes.text: Corso Riggs's uncle was a male Human living on Ord Mantell with his wife during the Cold War. He was the father of Rona Riggs and the uncle of Corso Riggs. When dating offworlders, Rona had her cousin run interference to avoid being caught by her father. When Corso left home to join the Peace Brigade, Rona left home with him. During the Separatist War on Ord Mantell he and his wife were killed by the Separatist forces.
Corso Riggs's uncle is mentioned in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Corso Riggs companion mission.
